item.title: Ikea Linked Foundation Plans Sale of £500 Million UK Hotels
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The foundation established by the founder of Ikea to manage funds to support the retailer’s long-term future is planning to sell a £500 million ($673 million) portfolio of UK hotels. Vastint Holding BV, a property company with a €5.8 billion ($6.8 billion) portfolio that’s ultimately ...
